desc: ＨＰが満タン時、攻撃力・防御力・回復力を大幅にアップ・クリティカル率を超絶アップ＆残りＨＰが少ないほど、攻撃力・防御力・回復力を超絶アップ

dictionary.lore: The Necromancer Mehisa slaughtered numerous heroes and built this staff from their remains, earning the title of "Skull Monarch." The Holy General Merluk favored this skull-adorned staff above all others, and it is said to have continued to corrupt Merluk's soul even in death due to extensive use of evil magic and sorcery. This staff holds great power due to its history, but is also believed to either corrupt the soul of its wielder directly or to grant the wielder power sufficient for leading to their already inevitable corruption.

name: 髑髏王の黒杖ムルルク

materials.name: 宝珠エルゼット・コア
